about_the_game:
The haunting halls of this mansion come to life thanks to The Tartarus Key’s atmospheric original soundtrack, created for the game by seasoned indie game composer Josie Brechner. Each track represents each of the captives’ fears and desires, elevating The Tartarus Key’s narrative to new and terrifying heights. It’s an essential part of the gameplay experience that we hope chills you to your very core.

Credits

Artist - Josie Brechner
Composer - Josie Brechner
Label - Visager Audio
Other Credits - Additional recording by Yaz Lancaster, violin [2, 3, 6, 7, 9, 11,12, 14, 16] and Rob Tunstall, cello [17]. Album cover illustration by Leonor Parra.

About the Composer

Josie Brechner (she/they) is a composer, sound designer, and musician from Brooklyn, NY. She's made emotionally-driven sound worlds for games like EXTREME MEATPUNKS FOREVER, Blossom Tales 1 & 2, Mixolumia, Best Friend Forever, Freshly Frosted, and now The Tartarus Key. She has toured the US and performed electronic music internationally under the name Visager. Music from Josie’s three open-source Songs from an Unmade World albums has been used in hundreds of projects around the world.
detailed_description:
The haunting halls of this mansion come to life thanks to The Tartarus Key’s atmospheric original soundtrack, created for the game by seasoned indie game composer Josie Brechner. Each track represents each of the captives’ fears and desires, elevating The Tartarus Key’s narrative to new and terrifying heights. It’s an essential part of the gameplay experience that we hope chills you to your very core.

short_description: Immerse yourself in the haunting sounds of The Tartarus Key’s soundtrack, featuring 17 original tracks by composer Josie Brechner.
